entry.title: LES SUÃŠTES WIND WARNING , North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 3:00 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: NE 27 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 140 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low zero.
